entry.source: 〉 The Great Spirit of Spite flew towards{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Great Spirit of Spite flew towards{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Obtained the Great Spirit of Spite.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Obtained the Great Spirit of Spite.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,279006}Ah, thank goodness... I was growing{F801}worried when I found myself unable{F801}to reach you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,279006}Ah, thank goodness... I was growing{F801}worried when I found myself unable{F801}to reach you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,279007}The preparations are ready on my end.{F801}The Commander is leading everyone{F801}down to Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,279008}They'll make their arrival in Shinjuku{F801}presently.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,279007}The preparations are ready on my end.{F801}The Commander is leading everyone{F801}down to Tokyo.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,279008}They'll make their arrival in Shinjuku{F801}presently.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,279003}That bizarre thing that appeared after{F801}you defeated the Demon Lord...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,279003}That bizarre thing that appeared after{F801}you defeated the Demon Lord...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,279004}I've scanned it, but I'm still not{F801}sure what it is.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,279005}But I never could understand human{F801}emotions, so I assume it's the Great{F801}Spirit of Spite.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,279004}I've scanned it, but I'm still not{F801}sure what it is.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,279005}But I never could understand human{F801}emotions, so I assume it's the Great{F801}Spirit of Spite.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,400063}Looks like the quest is going well.{F801}
